attr.title: Arco
attr.desc: A Mesoamerican fantasy RPG that blends turn-based and real-time combat. Explore the world through three handcrafted stories forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.
attr.desc_md:
A Mesoamerican fantasy RPG that blends turn-based and real-time combat. Explore the world through three handcrafted stories forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.

**Note: If the L2 toggle patch is applied, use L1/R1 to select combat actions.**
attr.inst: Copy arco.exe from your Steam download to ports/arco. A D-pad/L-stick toggle patch is available during installation.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366970/Arco/). Copy `arco.exe` to `ports/arco`. On first startup, you can apply a D-pad/L-stick L2 toggle patch (Recommended for D-pad only devices).
